subject: Issues with my new Simsonn Pro X Ultra pedals
description_text:
Hello,

Since installing my Simsonn Pro X Ultra pedals last week, I have been 
having an issue keeping them responding.  I am using iRacing, and can 
disconnect and reconnect the controller module from the computer to 
restart them and they will work for a session, however when I leave the 
session, after just a few minutes (5?), when I launch another session in 
iRacing the pedals will not be recognized in either iRacing or the 
Simsonn Manager application until I disconnect and reconnect the 
controller box.

If this cannot be resolved, I will want to return the pedals.



Jeff Hanisch

conversations.body_text: Hi Jeff Hanisch,   This issue is usually caused by insufficient USB power. Please plug the pedal directly into the blue USB 3.0 port on the back of your computer, and avoid using a USB hub. Also, make sure that both your computer and the base are properly grounded—that is, the plug or power strip should be connected to a three-prong wall outlet.
